00001 <?php
00002         require_once(dirname(__FILE__) . "/../include/tag_support.inc.php");
00003 
00008         class Wikipedia
00009         {
00013                 const WIKIPEDIA_URL_SCHEME = 'http://%s.wikipedia.org/wiki/%s';
00014                 
00020                 private static function wikize($term)
00021                 {
00022                         return urlencode(iconv('iso-8859-1', 'utf-8', str_replace(' ', '_', $term)));
00023                 }
00024 
00031                 public static function lookup_url($term, $lang = 'en')
00032                 {
00033                         return sprintf(self::WIKIPEDIA_URL_SCHEME,
00034                                 $lang,
00035                                 self::wikize($term));
00036                 }
00037 
00044                 public static function lookup($term, $lang = 'en')
00045                 {
00046                         print a($term, array('class' => 'external',
00047                                 'href' => self::lookup_url($term, $lang)));
00048                 }
00049         }
